channel.title: Adding Donator icon
channel.description: I want to add a donator icon (A $ beside the characters name in the chatbox) and I tried to copy the MODICONS to do this but I can't find the code for them, the code that tells the image to appear I mean. could someone pleade tell me where to find these codes. I am using the 317 system. not delta or PI though . Weeds client . whice is adapted from Galkon im pretty sure
